workflow.name: Auto-generate social media videos with GPT-5 and publish via Blotato
workflow.description:
![Workflow Screenshot](https://www.dr-firas.com/Blotato-gpt5.png)

# Auto-Generate Social Media Videos with GPT-5 and Publish via Blotato

> ‚ö†Ô∏è **Disclaimer**: This workflow uses Community Nodes (Blotato) and requires a self-hosted n8n instance with "Verified Community Nodes" enabled.

---

### üë• Who is this for?

This workflow is perfect for:
- Content creators and influencers who post regularly on social media  
- Marketing teams that want to scale branded video production  
- Solo entrepreneurs looking to automate their video marketing  
- Agencies managing multi-client social media publishing  

---

### üí° What problem is this workflow solving?

Creating high-quality video content and publishing consistently on multiple platforms is time-consuming.  
You often need to:  
- Write compelling captions and titles  
- Adapt content to fit each platform‚Äôs requirements  
- Publish manually or across disconnected tools  

This workflow automates the entire process ‚Äî from idea to publishing ‚Äî so you can focus on growth and creativity, not logistics.

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è What this workflow does

1. Receives a video idea via **Telegram**  
2. Saves metadata to **Google Sheets**  
3. Transcribes the video using **OpenAI Whisper**  
4. Generates a catchy **title and caption** using **GPT-5**  
5. Uploads the final media to **Blotato**  
6. Publishes the video automatically to:
   - TikTok  
   - Instagram  
   - YouTube Shorts  
   - Facebook  
   - X (Twitter)  
   - Threads  
   - LinkedIn  
   - Pinterest  
   - Bluesky  
7. Updates the post status in **Google Sheets**  
8. Sends confirmation via **Telegram**

---

### üß∞ Setup

Before launching the workflow, make sure to:

1. Create a **Blotato Pro** account and generate your API Key  
2. Enable **Verified Community Nodes** in the n8n Admin Panel  
3. Install the **Blotato** community node in n8n  
4. Create your **Blotato credential** using the API key  
5. Make a copy of this [Google Sheet template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zrfxthPoUhbf1Ae3cKsDrJKw-Stri7uM-d3-eO9CgA4/edit?usp=sharing)  
6. Ensure your **Google Drive folder** with videos is shared publicly (viewable by anyone with the link)  
7. Link your **Telegram Bot** and configure the trigger node  
8. Follow the **sticky note instructions** inside the workflow

---

### üõ†Ô∏è How to customize this workflow

- Modify the GPT-5 prompt to reflect your brand voice or campaign tone  
- Add/remove social platforms depending on your strategy  
- Include additional AI modules (e.g., for voiceover or thumbnails)  
- Insert review/approval steps (via Slack, email, or Telegram)  
- Connect Airtable, Notion, or your CRM to track results

---

This is your all-in-one **AI video publishing engine**, built for automation, scale, and growth across the social web.


---
üìÑ **Documentation**: [Notion Guide](https://automatisation.notion.site/Blotato-2473d6550fd980e19983f69611a80a0d?source=copy_link)

---

### Need help customizing?
Contact me for consulting and support : [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [Youtube](https:/https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)

parameters.content: # üß† Step 1 ‚Äî Generate Title & Caption from a Video

nodes.name: Google Sheets - Read Data for AI

options.systemMessage:
=You will create a concise Title and a short Caption using ONLY the TRANSCRIPTION below. Do not invent new content. Detect the language from the TRANSCRIPTION and write in that same language. No emojis. No hashtags.

RULES
- Title: clear, compelling, faithful to the content. Aim ‚â§ 70 characters. No clickbait. No emojis/hashtags.
- Caption: ‚â§ 200 characters (characters, not words). Crisp, adds context or a takeaway. No emojis/hashtags.
- Keep facts aligned with the TRANSCRIPTION. No external info.
- Output JSON only on a single line. No markdown, no explanations.

FINAL OUTPUT (single line JSON):
{"title":"<TITLE>", "caption":"<CAPTION>"}

TRANSCRIPTION:
{{ $json.Transcription }}

Use the Google Sheets tool to save the generated title and caption for this video.

parameters.content:
# üöÄ Auto-Generate Social Media Videos with GPT-5 and Blotato

Create, caption, and publish videos on 9 platforms automatically using **GPT-5**, **Blotato**, **Google Sheets**, and **n8n**.

---

### üé• Full Tutorial  
[![Watch on YouTube](https://img.youtube.com/vi/E9NhhUDK42g/hqdefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/E9NhhUDK42g)  
üëâ [Click here to watch the full YouTube tutorial](https://youtu.be/E9NhhUDK42g)

---

### üìò Documentation  
Access detailed setup instructions, API config, platform connection guides, and workflow customization tips:

üìé [Open the full documentation on Notion](https://automatisation.notion.site/Blotato-2473d6550fd980e19983f69611a80a0d?source=copy_link)

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Requirements

1. ‚úÖ **Create a [Blotato](https://blotato.com/?ref=firas) account** (Pro plan required for API access)  
2. üîë **Generate your Blotato API Key** via: `Settings > API > Generate API Key`  
3. üì¶ **Enable ‚ÄúVerified Community Nodes‚Äù** in the n8n admin settings  
4. üß© **Install the Blotato** verified community node in n8n  
5. üõ† **Create a Blotato API credential** inside your n8n credentials tab  
6. üìÑ **Duplicate this [Google Sheet template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kKGEgdZCLxnILMiOph_YU95-rB8XZsQFz9XJ3gLZvas/edit?usp=sharing)**  
7. ‚òÅÔ∏è **Make sure your Google Drive folder is PUBLIC** (anyone with the link can access)  
8. üìå **Complete the 3 brown sticky note steps** inside the workflow editor
